title: Cluster Claims Input
description: Input schema for memetic.claim_cluster.cluster capability - clusters similar claims

items.description: List of claim items to cluster (from extract_claim_items_from_sources)
Claim item with run_id, source_i, claim_i, domain, url, type, claim

sim_threshold.description: Similarity threshold for clustering (Jaccard token overlap)

max_pairs.description: Maximum pairwise comparisons to perform (safety cap)

seed.description: Optional deterministic seed (unused but kept for consistency)
